item.title: Synaesthesia Test
item.description: Creating a test for detection of Synaesthesia Synaesthesia could be explained as entanglement of the senses in most succinct sense. Many varieties of this symptom exist such as seeing voices and tasting shapes. Grapheme-color synaesthesia is among the diverse array of curious synaesthesia types. More than one percent of the population is estimated to experience it. I have recently created an online test that aspires to recognize people who experince grapheme-color synaesthesia obliviously.
